outputs.output_descr: The aim of this project is twofold: first to raise interest in human development issues in Jordan with the aim that Jordan adopts its own human development strategy and second,  to provide the necessary tools for policy making to this effect. The project proposes to achieve this by the production of a National Human Development Report (NHDR) for Jordan each year for three consecutive years, based on the methodology of UNDP's  global Human Development Reports. In order to produce these reports, the project will conduct research, build an information system for human development indicators, and train local researchers in human development concepts and applications.

donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

In order to produce these reports, the project will conduct research, build an information system for human development indicators, and train local researchers in human development concepts and applications.

project_descr: HUMAN DEVELOPMENT PROFILES AN STRATEGY FOR JORDAN
